physics.EulerianFluids2D

Interface LinearSolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinearSolvers

    public interface LinearSolver
    Interface that each linear solver must implement. Alternatively one massive class may be implemented instead.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void linearSolver(int b, float[] x, float[] x0, float a, float c)
      Iterative linear system solver, e.g., Jacobi, Gauss-Seidel, SOR, Conjugate Gradient, Multigrid, etc.
      void setBoundry(int b, float[] x)
      Specifies boundary conditions.
      void setLinearSolver(java.lang.String logic)
      Chose/change the linear solver logic to use.

    • Method Detail

      • setLinearSolver

        void setLinearSolver(java.lang.String logic)
        Chose/change the linear solver logic to use.
        Parameters:
        logic - the linear solver logic to use.

      • linearSolver

        void linearSolver(int b,
                float[] x,
                float[] x0,
                float a,
                float c)
        Iterative linear system solver, e.g., Jacobi, Gauss-Seidel, SOR, Conjugate Gradient, Multigrid, etc.
        Parameters:
        b - orientation of the velocity or density component i.e., (x,y).
        x - a vector of velocities or densities.
        x0 - the old value of velocities and densities per grid cell.
        a -
        c -

      • setBoundry

        void setBoundry(int b,
              float[] x)
        Specifies boundary conditions.
        Parameters:
        b - orientation of the velocity or density component i.e., (x,y).
        x - the velocity or density array to enforce boundaries
